sentences.english: Hereby I would sincerely recommend this highly-talented student to your institution.
sentences.chinese: 在此我鄭重的向貴校推薦這位才華出衆的學生。

sentences.english: Thank you for admission and granting financial assistance of teaching assistantship.
sentences.chinese: 感謝貴校錄取並提供助教獎學金。

sentences.english: Does your international work involve pupils of different ages?
sentences.chinese: 貴校的國際化建設是否了年齡段的學生？

sentences.english: Please send me a catalogue and an application for admission.
sentences.chinese: 請函寄貴校簡章與入學申請表格各一份。

sentences.english: I would be very thankful for information about entry to your college.
sentences.chinese: 若能寄給我貴校的入壆申請材料我將十分感激。

sentences.english: I will be extremeccly grateful for information about entry to your college.
sentences.chinese: 若能寄給我貴校的入學提交請求材料我將十分感謝。

sentences.english: Could you tell me which majors in your university are available for international students?
sentences.chinese: 請問貴校的哪幾個專業是向外國留學生開放的？

sentences.english: To conclude, I sincerely hope the students in your school can come to China, to visit our school.
sentences.chinese: 最後，希望貴校的同學可以到中國，來我們學校。

sentences.english: So no matter how to please your school opened the letter for me to receive letter.
sentences.chinese: 所以無論如何請貴校幫我開了這封“再接納函”。

sentences.english: I am looking forward to visiting your university in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 我期待着在不遠的將來訪問貴校。

sentences.english: Can we take work-study program at Murdoch?
sentences.chinese: 在貴校可以半工半學嗎？

sentences.english: What are the students' overall performances in the 2006 Territory-wide System Assessment?
sentences.chinese: 貴校學生2006年系統性評估的整體表現是如何？

sentences.english: I am writing this letter to inquire about the entrance to your university.
sentences.chinese: 我現在寫信詢問有關就讀貴校的事宜。

sentences.english: I wish to pursue my Master's degree in your university.
sentences.chinese: 我希望到貴校攻讀碩士學位。

sentences.english: There are many reasons why I want to study in your university.
sentences.chinese: 這是我爲什麼想在貴校學習的原因。

sentences.english: Its graduates have made a big contribution to your country’s engagement with the world.
sentences.chinese: 貴校的畢業生對貴國與世界的接觸做出了很大的貢獻。

definition: the tone of a school/campus atmosphere
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to work part time while studying/work-study program
abbr. for 國際關係學院|国际关系学院[Guo2 ji4 Guan1 xi4 Xue2 yuan4], University of International Relations, Beijing
junior high school (Tw)/abbr. to 國中|国中[guo2 zhong1]
